description: Defines the Note entity class for the notes application, including fields, constructors, and lifecycle methods for database persistence.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Entity representing a personal note with fields for id, userId, title, content, creation and update timestamps, and lifecycle methods for persisting and updating.

methods.name: Note()
methods.description: Default constructor for creating a Note instance.

methods.name: Note(String userId, String title, String content)
methods.description: Constructor to create a new Note with specified user ID, title, and content.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the note.

methods.name: getUserId
methods.description: Returns the user ID associated with the note.

methods.name: setUserId
methods.description: Sets the user ID for the note.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of the note.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the note.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Returns the content of the note.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the content of the note.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the note was created.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the last updated timestamp for the note.
